segments.text: So how long do you plan to live here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'd like to sign a year-long contract , if that's OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine by me . Do you know how to read this kind of contract ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We've signed them before . We even brought our chops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . When in Rome , you guys know what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll sign our signatures , too . And give you our passport numbers along with our ARC numbers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That about does it . See you in a week .
segments.speaker: S1
